name: Instant Pot® Zucchini Steel Cut Oatmeal
author: Tammy Lynn
summary: Add some veggies to your breakfast by trying this steel cut oatmeal packed with zucchini, spiced with cinnamon and nutmeg, and sweetened with maple syrup. It's made in the Instant Pot® in about 30 minutes.
directions: Melt coconut oil in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) set to the Saute function
Add oats and toast until they are starting to brown, 2 to 3 minutes
Add water, almond milk, zucchini, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 4 minutes
Allow 10 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes
Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Stir in maple syrup and vanilla extract
Top each bowl with 1 tablespoon walnuts
